text: Shamir Thomas (born 3 November 1983) is a Grenadian retired track and field athlete who specialized in the throwing events. With multiple CARIFTA and other games medals, Shamir is one of the most successful Grenadian athletes in the throwing events at the Youth and Junior levels. ==Competition record== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=4|1998 |rowspan=2|CARIFTA Games |rowspan=2|Port of Spain |bgcolor=gold|1st |Shot put (U17) |14.66 m |- |bgcolor=silver|2nd |Discus throw |42.36 m |- |rowspan=2|Central American and Caribbean Junior Champs |rowspan=2|Port of Spain |bgcolor=gold|1st |Shot put (U17) |14.20 m |- |- |bgcolor=silver|2nd |Discus throw (U17) |40.59 m |- |rowspan=2|1999 |rowspan=2|CARIFTA Games |rowspan=2|Port of Spain |bgcolor=gold|1st |Shot put (U17) |14.37 m |- |- |bgcolor=gold|1st |Discus throw(U17) |47.79 m |- |rowspan=2|2000 |rowspan=2|CARIFTA Games |rowspan=2|St. George's, Grenada |bgcolor=silver|2nd |Shot put (U20) |13.88 m |- |- |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |Discus throw (U20) |46.18 m |- |rowspan=2|2001 |rowspan=2|CARIFTA Games |rowspan=2|Bridgetown, Barbados |bgcolor=gold|1st |Shot put (U20) |14.69 m |- |bgcolor=gold|1st |Discus throw (U20) |47.56 m |- |- |rowspan=4|2002 |rowspan=2|CARIFTA Games |rowspan=2|Nassau, Bahamas |bgcolor=silver|2nd |Shot put (U20) |14.85 mhttp://www.cfpitiming.com/2002%20track%20events/Carifta%202002/Carifta_Results_2002.htm |- |- |bgcolor=gold|1st |Discus throw (U20) |48.80 mhttp://www.cfpitiming.com/2002%20track%20events/Carifta%202002/Carifta_Results_2002.htm |- |rowspan=2|Central American and Caribbean Junior Champs |rowspan=2|Bridgetown, Barbados |bgcolor=silver|2nd |Shot put |16.83 m |- |- |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |Discus throw |50.97 m |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Male shot putters Category:Grenadian male discus throwers
